Welcome to my website

  • About Me

Who I am

I'm the Head of Cloud Software at PassiveLogic, where I manage a team of software engineers. We design and maintain cloud infrastructure and backend web services to enable fully autonomous building control systems. I have deep experience in software engineering, GraphQL, building energy efficiency, and smart building software.

Next

Stuff I do

I'm passionate about reducing carbon emissions and open source software. In my free time, I enjoy contributing to Project Haystack, OpenStreetMap, and other open source projects when I'm not hiking with my wife or out on the soccer field.
